title: Shrimp and Cauliflower Sauté With Rosemary-Caper Butter
sub_head: A scrumptious rosemary-caper butter cloaks the shrimp and the cauliflower it sautés with. You’ll want to keep some on hand to bring a hit of flavor and richness to all sorts of dishes.
body: To explore and search through all our recipes, check out the new WSJ Recipes page.
